item.description:
The First Meeting of the Flex Meetup Group!

The speaker and topic will be announced soon...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be running the meeting over Adobe Connect more information to come. So check back soon.
item.why: Not everyone has a local Flex User group but thanks to a little technology you can get the same information and experience. This group is worldwide and the meetings are held online through Adobe Connect sessions.
item.name: The First Meeting of the Flex Meetup Group
